name: UI Polish Sprint
description: Sprint containing 4 backlog items focused on UI polish and mobile UX improvements. Total story points: 7.

userStories.title: Unknown word tap feedback
userStories.description: When a user clicks/taps on a word that doesn't exist in the dictionary, show the word in 'recent opgezocht' with a 'no definition found' message on the side card.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking unknown word shows it in 'recent opgezocht'
Side card displays 'no definition found' for words not in dictionary
Verify in browser using Chrome DevTools MCP

userStories.title: Fix translation overlay overlap on mobile
userStories.description: The translation display has a layout issue where text lines overlap/stack incorrectly on mobile devices. Fix the CSS/layout for the translation component.
acceptanceCriteria: Translation text displays correctly without overlap on mobile
Consistent behavior between desktop and mobile
Verify fix on mobile viewport using Chrome DevTools MCP

userStories.title: Definition badge tooltip on main card
userStories.description: Add tooltip showing 'X of Y' when hovering over the definition number badge on main card. Reuse implementation from 'recent opgezocht' card.
acceptanceCriteria: Tooltip 'X of Y' appears on hover over definition badge
Verify in browser using Chrome DevTools MCP

userStories.title: Standardize badge popup styling
userStories.description: The popups when hovering over badges in 'recent opgezocht' card use default browser tooltip style. Make them consistent with the styled popups on the main card.
acceptanceCriteria: Badge hover popups in 'recent opgezocht' use same style as main card
Consistent look and feel across the app
Verify in browser using Chrome DevTools MCP

technicalNotes.verification: Use Chrome DevTools MCP for visual verification
